title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Patrick Mahomes after the Chiefs struggle to start the season by putting his career in context next to some other all time great QBs. He believes Aaron Rodgers leaving Green Bay for the Steelers after this season makes perfect sense for everyone involved. He also points out Tom Brady's success and the biggest mistake Bill Belichick almost made but was saved by owner Robert Kraft. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown what makes Josh Allen and the Bills offense so special. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
